modName: Bamboo Quarterstaffs And Bows For Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#ff7700]As for 2017 I have fully retrextured the [b][u]quarterstaffs[/u][/b]
Now there are 8 Very High quality HD textures for strong computers (each texture size is 11 MB).
[/color][/b][/center][b][center][color=#00ffff][b][b]quarterstaffs version:  5.0[b][b][b] - High definition - continued.
[/b][/b][/b][/b][/b]one handed & dual wield supported.[/color][/center]
[center][color=#ffff00][b]  *** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]***[/b][/color][/center]

[u]File Descriptions:[/u]

[b][b][u][color=#00ffff]Main File[/color] Quarterstaffs version 5.0[/u] - [/b]8[/b] [b][color=#00ffff][b][b][b][b][b]High definition [/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/color][/b]Bamboo Quarterstaffs Weapons.

[b][b][b][u][color=#00ff00]Optional [/color]Quarterstaffs version 5.0 Ice patch[/u] - [/b][/b][/b]Enchanting all staffs with random ice effect on target (4% chance). Put after version 5.0 in mod list.

[b][u][b][b][color=#ff0000][b][b][b][b]old but functional[/b][/b][/b][/b][/color][/b] [/b]Quarterstaffs version 4.0[/u] - 10 [b]Bamboo Quarterstaffs Weapons[/b] + [/b]2 Pine Tree Logs Weapons.

[u][b][color=#ff0000][b][b][b][b]disc[/b][/b][/b][/b][/color][color=#ff0000][b][b][b][b][b]ontinued but functional[/b][/b][/b][/b][/b][/color][/b] Bow version 4.0[/u] - 8 Bamboo bows.
[center]
[b][color=#ffff00][b]  *** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]***[/b][/color][/b]

[youtube]-x5BcDkpw9A[/youtube][/center][center][/center]
[/b][center][b][/b][b][color=#ffff00][b]  *** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]***[/b][/color][/b][/center]
[u][b]Usage:
[/b][/u]Craft the item under "Wood" menu. (if you need firewood press "~" and type "player.additem 0006F993 30")


[center][b][color=#ffff00][b]  *** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]*** [/b][b]***[/b][/color][/b][/center][center][/center]
[u][b]Mod editing:[/b][/u]
*You can alter the weapon speed\damage\reach (and any other parameter) in the CK (Creation Kit) by using the plugin as the "active file" (File -> Data). Then find the weapon (the list is in: Weapons -> BambooStaff) and double-click on it. Alter values and save when you have finished.
*If you want to change the bows string color this is super easy. use photoshop\gimp with a DDS plugin, The color is selected from the left top corner of the DDS (you can actually make a square of color on the left top corner above the top line). if you use photoshop save option is interpolate alpha.

[u][b]Special Thanks: epbreen, Artisanix![/b][/u]

[b][u]My other Mods:[/u]
[color=#00ffff][size=4][center][size=5][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16413/?]Angry Birds Arrows For skyrim[/url][/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24845]Unicorn - Blue transparent patch[/url][/size][/center][/size][/color][/b]
author: Majistik

files.name: Quarterstaffnobows291
files.changelogHtml:
Added a new staff, The Ghost Bamboo Quarterstaff
New pictures and video(the left one) preview with FXAA enabled (my settings are in the download page)
Meshes rotated to look somehow better

files.name: Quarterstaff30
files.changelogHtml:
Added 11 New Bamboo Bows Weapons. Special Thanks go to Artisanix.
Known bugs: Ghost bow animation is bad.
Known bugs: Dropping the weapons is borked.

files.name: Bamboo - Quarterstaffs ONLY (version 4.0)
files.changelogHtml:
Mod is now separated to Quarterstaffs\\Bows which are downloaded separately
Bug Fixed: Weapon Dropping in several weapons
All weapon now have a correct alpha channel with normal maps
Weapons Shader is fixed: weapons will now be lighted correctly as \"matte\" material
Weapons Shader is fixed: Weapons now have better and more realistic response to the environmental light
Weapons readjusted (again) and are now friendlier (on a \"meant to be played\" way) to graphical mods (like FXAA)
Several Quarterstaffs have been removed as they are too hard to retexture and fit this version quality.
Added a few Quarterstaffs
Added 2 Pine tree log weapons
All models have been retextured
All textured now have reasonable size
Mod will now take less resources
Fixed a bug on the ghost bow animation
Fixed spelling mistake
